skillMainKh.title: តេស្តវាយតម្លៃតាមភាពខ្លាំងខ្សោយ
skillMainKh.desc: វាយតម្លៃពីភាពខ្លាំងខ្សោយនៃជំនាញកំពុងតម្រូវការ សម្រាប់ការងារនាពេលបច្ចុប្បន្នដោយផ្អែកលើការកំណត់នៅក្នុង O*NET​ Database​
skillMainKh.buttonText: ចាប់ផ្តើមតេស្ត

introKh.title: តេស្តវាយតម្លៃតាម​
introKh.highlight: ភាពខ្លាំងខ្សោយ
introKh.description: ដោយផ្អែកលើប្រភេទតេស្តនេះ អ្នកនឹងទទួលបានលទ្ធផលពីភាពខ្លាំងខ្សោយរបស់អ្នកនៃជំនាញកំពុងតម្រូវការសម្រាប់ការងារ នាពេលបច្ចុប្បន្នដោយផ្អែកលើការកំណត់នៅក្នុង O*NET​ Database​ និងការណែនាំពីអាជីពការងារ ជំនាញដែលគួរជ្រើសរើសកាន់តែប្រសើរជាងមុន។

questions.question: When faced with a challenging problem, I find multiple ways to approach a solution.
I always evaluate different perspectives before making a decision.
I can easily apply mathematical concepts to everyday situations.
I enjoy solving scientific problems through experimentation and research.
I can adjust my study methods based on the subject or task at hand.
I frequently track my progress when working on a task or project.
I listen carefully to others and fully understand their point of view before responding.
I can easily recognize the emotional state of others based on their actions or words.
I often consider multiple factors before making an important decision.
I feel comfortable teaching or guiding others when they need help learning something new.
I actively seek new knowledge and skills to improve myself.
I am able to organize my time effectively to meet deadlines.
I am able to organize my thoughts clearly and logically in writing.
I feel confident speaking in front of groups or audiences.
I can understand complex reading material and summarize key points effectively.
